p: Similarly, there was a decrease in GPx activity in both liver and kidney homogenates of untreated diabetic rats (0.27 and 0.26 U/L, respectively) compared to the NC group (3.18 and 1.83 U/L, respectively) ( Fig. 3C and 3D). However, administration of PBE beverage blends for 14 days restored GPx activity in the livers (1.26 to 3.13 U/L) and kidneys (1.07 to 1.80 U/L) of treated rats.
